definition: eldest brother/big brother (polite address for a man of about the same age as oneself)/gang leader/boss
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
elder brother
big brother

sentences.english: YangXiu see eldest brother became so discomfiture.
sentences.chinese: 杨秀一见大哥变得如此狼狈。

sentences.english: Isn't that fun? I enjoy lying on the field at night and looking up at the starry sky.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥喜欢夜晚时分躺在营地上，看著满天星斗。

sentences.english: Jackie was in Shunde, China last week helping raise money for Shunde charities.
sentences.chinese: 上周大哥在中国顺德帮助顺德的慈善团体筹备善款。

sentences.english: The market, meet the rabbit elder brother often do.
sentences.chinese: 赶集办年货，遇见兔大哥。

sentences.english: Big Brother's mobile phone wallpaper is a lovely female wanderers, about eight or nine years old.
sentences.chinese: 大哥的手机壁纸是个可爱的女娃儿，大约八九岁。

sentences.english: Mark, listeners just love to hear your voice.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥声音好好听，对吧？

sentences.english: That quiet man was an underworld king-pin.
sentences.chinese: 那个安安静静的人是个黑社会老大哥。

sentences.english: I also love looking at the stars on a clear night.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥喜欢夜晚时分躺在营地上，看著满天星斗。

sentences.english: At once I picked out my elder brother in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我立刻在人群中认出我大哥来。

sentences.english: My supine slowly-rotating Lao hi teeth, all say oneself is the big brother.
sentences.chinese: 仰脖朝天唠嗨嗑，都说自己是大哥。

sentences.english: Eldest brother is sent a hospital by Yang Yifan of younger sister's husband, rescue is invalid die.
sentences.chinese: 大哥被妹夫杨亦帆送到医院，抢救无效死亡。

sentences.english: Hello and welcome to English World. This is your friend Mark.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥和郭文洁我欢迎你来到英语世界。

sentences.english: Li son, you are this simpleton, none of eldest brothers knows to say some Shis.
sentences.chinese: 璃儿，你这个傻瓜，大哥都不知道该说些什。

sentences.english: My older brother was always gone. He is served in the army for 31 years.
sentences.chinese: 我大哥总是不在家，因为他当兵，一当就是31年。

sentences.english: Brother, you go with us to help us to buy tickets, better?
sentences.chinese: 大哥，你陪我们去吧，帮我们买张票，好不？

sentences.english: Wakin and Jacky Cheung once were the target I tried to copy.
sentences.chinese: 华健和学友大哥都曾是我模仿的对象。
